channel.title: Comments on: Better Living Through Technology
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: jenny
item.dc:creator: jenny
item.description: you're taking pictures of your cats? leave those poor cats alone already! you've probly already traumatized them with the laser pointer ;)
